discussion_comments.comment_body: These strange and inconsistent styles are suspicious. Generally all elements should be on a grid (usually of multiples of 4 or 8px), so when there's something outside that, I want to know why.
I appreciate the attempt at visual centering, but we don't do this elsewhere in the UI. In the test tree, the gap is `4px` and I think we should keep that gap with all of these icons.
I would stick with a 8px grid and use `8px` here. We lose some space but it feels much nicer to me.
